entry.title: Ending Year 2020!
entry.summary: The year 2020 has been challenging, different and best of all over. In this short blog I would like to share few updates in terms of my research work. Both Vijini and I were able to publish our first research articles of the PhD! MetaBCC-LR This piece of work was presented at ISMB 2020 DOI: 10.1093/bioinformatics/btaa441 Abstract Motivation Metagenomics studies have provided key insight...
